channel.title: Help!?!?!?!?! need to kno few things!?!?!?!
channel.description: *k 1st of all cud some1 explain rlly easily how to change way npc's face thnk alot will rlly preciate it *2nd can some give me the code to put in, believe to be in npc.cfg so that the balloon animals in my server move around like this http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4MIX_azaxe8 i dont care bout anythin in that vid except that yall see wat i mean bout balloon animals thnk again i rlly preciate it :) (oh yea and if yall can, can yall gimee code so somethin happens wen u clik pop balloon animal i think was the option and that they drop somthing but can yall put #### in the code for wat they will drop and let me add the drops plz thnk thisll rlly help alot) and finally i kno this was alot but thnks to ery1 thats reply and make my server better i rlly aprectiate it thnk :) :D :cool: srry i forgot sumthin *3rd prolly easist question i put up wat the heck is this called!?!!??!!?!?!?!?!? (btw im not sure hjow to add images so here goes :confused:) [img][/img]

item.title: Help!?!?!?!?! need to kno few things!?!?!?!

lol u mind if i dont use msn for anything anywer else i can add u? if not ill get a msn and then ill add u
[/quote]
I don’t have anything else, soo get msn lol[/quote]
k lol
srry i made acc now how do i add u again? :o :o :o :o

lol nvm i found u is ur name rodrigo MOLINA?

item.title: Help!?!?!?!?! need to kno few things!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:12, topic:407857”][quote author=r0m3r0 link=topic=509142.msg3694658#msg3694658 date=1312346400]

*k 1st of all cud some1 explain rlly easily how to change way npc’s face thnk alot will rlly preciate it
*2nd can some give me the code to put in, believe to be in npc.cfg so that the balloon animals in my server move around like this http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4MIX_azaxe8 i dont care bout anythin in that vid except that yall see wat i mean bout balloon animals thnk again i rlly preciate it (oh yea and if yall can, can yall gimee code so somethin happens wen u clik pop balloon animal i think was the option and that they drop somthing but can yall put #### in the code for wat they will drop and let me add the drops plz thnk thisll rlly help alot)
and finally i kno this was alot but thnks to ery1 thats reply and make my server better i rlly aprectiate it thnk
srry i forgot sumthin
*3rd prolly easist question i put up wat the heck is this called!?!!??!!?!?!?!?!? (btw im not sure hjow to add images so here goes )

For the event, find the animation, then spawn the npcs, into spawn-config.cfg idc if this isn’t PI. Then just add a saving token so when they click the animal they get kil-ballon += 1; and make the lever check if they have 5 ballon then they can teleport out, and clear their tokens when they leave. IDc if it don’t make sense smd.

lol wtf u gud coder if u are wana help me make the server its not an event i just want animals to move like they did in vid and to drop stuff if u do wana help ill explain wat im tryin to do
[/quote]
Add me on msn lazerbike@hotmail.com, and I can help you much easier.[/quote]
lol u mind if i dont use msn for anything anywer else i can add u? if not ill get a msn and then ill add u

Read full topic

item.title: Help!?!?!?!?! need to kno few things!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“r0m3r0, post:11, topic:407857”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=509142.msg3693851#msg3693851 date=1312309076]

*k 1st of all cud some1 explain rlly easily how to change way npc’s face thnk alot will rlly preciate it
*2nd can some give me the code to put in, believe to be in npc.cfg so that the balloon animals in my server move around like this http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4MIX_azaxe8 i dont care bout anythin in that vid except that yall see wat i mean bout balloon animals thnk again i rlly preciate it (oh yea and if yall can, can yall gimee code so somethin happens wen u clik pop balloon animal i think was the option and that they drop somthing but can yall put #### in the code for wat they will drop and let me add the drops plz thnk thisll rlly help alot)
and finally i kno this was alot but thnks to ery1 thats reply and make my server better i rlly aprectiate it thnk
srry i forgot sumthin
*3rd prolly easist question i put up wat the heck is this called!?!!??!!?!?!?!?!? (btw im not sure hjow to add images so here goes )

For the event, find the animation, then spawn the npcs, into spawn-config.cfg idc if this isn’t PI. Then just add a saving token so when they click the animal they get kil-ballon += 1; and make the lever check if they have 5 ballon then they can teleport out, and clear their tokens when they leave. IDc if it don’t make sense smd.
[/quote]

lol wtf u gud coder if u are wana help me make the server its not an event i just want animals to move like they did in vid and to drop stuff if u do wana help ill explain wat im tryin to do[/quote]
Add me on msn lazerbike@hotmail.com, and I can help you much easier.

Read full topic

*2nd can some give me the code to put in, believe to be in npc.cfg so that the balloon animals in my server move around like this http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4MIX_azaxe8 i dont care bout anythin in that vid except that yall see wat i mean bout balloon animals thnk again i rlly preciate it (oh yea and if yall can, can yall gimee code so somethin happens wen u clik pop balloon animal i think was the option and that they drop somthing but can yall put #### in the code for wat they will drop and let me add the drops plz thnk thisll rlly help alot)
and finally i kno this was alot but thnks to ery1 thats reply and make my server better i rlly aprectiate it thnk
srry i forgot sumthin
*3rd prolly easist question i put up wat the heck is this called!?!!??!!?!?!?!?!? (btw im not sure hjow to add images so here goes )

[/quote]
For the event, find the animation, then spawn the npcs, into spawn-config.cfg idc if this isn’t PI. Then just add a saving token so when they click the animal they get kil-ballon += 1; and make the lever check if they have 5 ballon then they can teleport out, and clear their tokens when they leave. IDc if it don’t make sense smd.[/quote]

lol wtf u gud coder if u are wana help me make the server its not an event i just want animals to move like they did in vid and to drop stuff if u do wana help ill explain wat im tryin to do

item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“r0m3r0, post:1, topic:407857”]*k 1st of all cud some1 explain rlly easily how to change way npc’s face thnk alot will rlly preciate it
*2nd can some give me the code to put in, believe to be in npc.cfg so that the balloon animals in my server move around like this http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4MIX_azaxe8 i dont care bout anythin in that vid except that yall see wat i mean bout balloon animals thnk again i rlly preciate it (oh yea and if yall can, can yall gimee code so somethin happens wen u clik pop balloon animal i think was the option and that they drop somthing but can yall put #### in the code for wat they will drop and let me add the drops plz thnk thisll rlly help alot)
and finally i kno this was alot but thnks to ery1 thats reply and make my server better i rlly aprectiate it thnk
srry i forgot sumthin
*3rd prolly easist question i put up wat the heck is this called!?!!??!!?!?!?!?!? (btw im not sure hjow to add images so here goes )
[/quote]
For the event, find the animation, then spawn the npcs, into spawn-config.cfg idc if this isn’t PI. Then just add a saving token so when they click the animal they get kil-ballon += 1; and make the lever check if they have 5 ballon then they can teleport out, and clear their tokens when they leave. IDc if it don’t make sense smd.

fine and by the way im in high school lol ok anf fine i will type right the whole thing because i think you might be able to help

*ok 1st of all could someone explain really easily how to change way npc’s face thanks a-lot will really appreciate it
*2nd can some give me the code to put in, i believe you put it into npc.cfg so that the balloon animals in my server move around like this http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4MIX_azaxe8 i don’t care bout anything in that video except that you see what i mean about balloon animals thanks again i really appreciate it (oh yea and if you can, can you give me the code so something happens when you click ‘‘pop balloon animal’’ i think was the option and that they drop somthing but can yiu put #### in the code for what they will drop and let me add the drops please thanks this willl really help alot)
and finally i know this was a-lot but thanks to ery1 that replys and makes my server better i really appreciate it thanks
sorry i forgot sumthing
